channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: In West Virginia coal country, new Social Security barriers present challenges to the most vulnerable
item.description: New requirements that Social Security recipients go online or in person to a field office to access key benefits, instead of just making a phone call, will pose challenges for many people.

item.title: 12 dozen lawmakers accused in 8 years. Women in the statehouse weigh #MeTooâ€™s impact
New Hampshire town elections offer a preview of citizenship voting rules being considered nationwide
